parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end timestamp of the query.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the asset.

parameters.name: InternetIp
parameters.description: The public IP address of the server.

parameters.name: IntranetIp
parameters.description: The private IP address of the server.

parameters.name: Operation
parameters.description:
Type of operation on a file. eg:

- **DELETE**: delete the file.
- **WRITE**: write the file.
- **READ**: read the file.
- **RENAME**: rename the file.
- **CHOWN**: set the file owner and file association group operations.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start timestamp of the query.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the event. Valid values:

*   0: unhandled
*   1: handled
*   2: added to the whitelist
*   3: ignored

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server.

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUID of the server.
